title: 2nd Annual NYC Winter Workshop
desc: 3nd WINTER CAPOEIRA LUANDA WORKSHOP? Organized by Contramestre Chuvisco and Est. Coruja February 18 - 21, 2016 I have the pleasure to invite you to attend our Capoeira 3rd.Winter Workshop. Come and experience the Brazilian culture of Capoeira,Maculele & Dan?a Guerreira.? Everyone is welcome!!! Guests: Mestre Jelon Vieira - New York, US Mestre Guerreiro - Goi?nia, GO, Brazil Mestre Peninha - Toronto, CA Mestre Chuvisquinho - Boston, US? Mestre TicuTico - Boston, US Mestrando Cocada - New Orleans, US Contramestre Borracha - Ashburn, VA, US Contramestre Molejo - Toulusse, France Contramestra Jossy - GO, Brazil Contramestre Alegria - New York, US Professor Tiba, New York, NY Professor Black - Paris, France Professora Pimentinha, New York, NY Professor 45, New York, NY Professor Gringo - Houston, TX, US Professor Nego - Las Vegas, US Professor Morcego - Worcester, MA, US And many more to confirm... Thursday 02/18 - 6:00 to 10:00pm ( CL New Rochelle) Friday, 02/19 - 7:00 to 10:00pm (NYC) Saturday, 02/20: Kids batizado - 10:00 to 12:00pm (CL New Rochelle) and 2:00 to 6:00pm (NYC) Sunday, 02/21 - 2:00 to 6:00 pm (NYC) **Schedule is subject to change For more info please contact Contramestre Chuvisco at 917-573-9387 or Est. Coruja at 347-859-6648 or leave a message at this event page. PS: Capoeira uniform will be required.
